snippet: By beating Buffalo, Dallas tied the Rangers and the Montreal Canadiens for the most points in the league, with 30.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Dallas Stars defeat Buffalo Sabres, 3-1; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: By beating Buffalo, Dallas tied the Rangers and the Montreal Canadiens for the most points in the league, with 30.

headline.print_headline: Stars Earn 15th Victory by Topping the Sabres
headline.main: Stars Earn 15th Victory by Topping the Sabres
